sentences.english: He loves human being but he never marries or has any children.
sentences.chinese: 他熱愛人類，卻從未受過擁有妻室與子女的天倫之樂。

sentences.english: When the flies, their knee, the sharing of family happiness.
sentences.chinese: 時如梭，兒孫齊膝下，共享天倫樂。

sentences.english: Rove says he wants to spend more time with his family.
sentences.chinese: 羅夫表示他將多花些時間與家人共享天倫。

sentences.english: Nowadays Christmas Day is a time to spend with family and relatives.
sentences.chinese: 如今，聖誕節是家人和親戚共享天倫的日子。

sentences.english: Chairman Tony Lo had a happy time with his family.
sentences.chinese: 會長羅祥安與其家人共享天倫樂。

sentences.english: We basked in the love of our family.
sentences.chinese: 我們享受着融融的天倫之樂。

sentences.english: His wife and children parents together the happiness of a family union, and friend wine lotus word poetry.
sentences.chinese: 與妻兒父母齊天倫之樂，與朋友友把酒忘憂言詩詞。

sentences.english: That old man is basking in the love of his family.
sentences.chinese: 那位老人家正享受着融融的天倫之樂。

sentences.english: Sometimes, Betty and I and other members of the family spend a nice weekend together at Fanling Lodge.
sentences.chinese: 一家人有時會到粉嶺別墅度週末，共享天倫之樂。

sentences.english: Rich or poor, we will keep together and be happy in one another.
sentences.chinese: 不論貧富，我們都要廝守一起，共享天倫之樂。

definition: surrounded by distinguished friends (idiom); in company
bridal room and ornamented candles/wedding festivities (idiom)
